div.div:
📝 gemini-release-notes.yml
• Generate release notes
• Create header image (Imagen)
• Update GitHub Release
• Commit to generated-images/

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(218, 232, 252), rgb(29, 41, 59)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(108, 142, 191), rgb(92, 121, 163));

div.div:
📰 gemini-release-articles.yml
• Triggered by release-notes completion
• Fetch release notes body
• Generate Oasis hybrid article
• Commit to articles/oasis/

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 258px; height: 1px; padding-top: 232px; margin-left: 737px;

div.div:
📄 Oasis Hybrid Article
(articles/oasis/*.md)
• Zenn front matter
• Qiita front matter
• WordPress front matter
• Shared content body

div.div:
🪄 oasis-sync.yml
• Detect new Oasis articles (push to articles/oasis/)
• Generate platform metadata with Gemini
• Split into platform-specific formats
• Commit to articles/zenn/, articles/qiita/, articles/wordpress/
